item.title: Klarna 与支持者在美国首次公开募股中筹资 13.7 亿美元，定价高于区间范围
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Klarna Group Plc 及其部分股东在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 13.7 亿美元，定价高于市场预期范围。【原文：Klarna Group Plc and some of its shareholders raised $1.37 billion in a US initial public offering priced above a marketed range, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊鲁卡暂停澳大利亚项目的矿砂生产
item.description: Iluka Resources Ltd. 将从 12 月 1 日起暂停其西澳大利亚矿山和窑厂的矿砂生产，理由是需求不佳。【原文：Iluka Resources Ltd. will suspend mineral sands production at its Western Australian mine and kiln operations from Dec. 1, citing poor demand.】

item.title: 美国就业前景降温，亚洲股市低迷：市场综述
item.description: 在美联储（Federal Reserve）降息以抑制就业下滑的希望刺激下，标普500指数（S&P 500）走高并创下历史纪录，亚洲股市开盘后走势平淡，目前的焦点是本周晚些时候的通胀数据。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a muted open after the S&P 500 nudged higher to a record on hopes the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates to curb a jobs downturn, with focus now on inflation data later this week.】

item.title: 博通公司首席执行官有望在实现 2030 年人工智能销售目标后获得报酬
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom Inc.首席执行官霍克-谭（Hock Tan）的续约合同中有一项条款，如果公司到 2030 年人工智能产品销售额达到 1200 亿美元，他将获得数亿美元的股票补偿。【原文：Broadcom Inc. Chief Executive Officer Hock Tan has a clause in his contract extension that would bring hundreds of millions of dollars in stock compensation if the company reaches $120 billion in artificial intelligence product sales by 2030.】

item.title: 预测甲骨文公司价值将增长1900亿美元
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）的市值有望增加约 1900 亿美元，此前该公司云基础设施业务的收入预期大幅增长，令其股价一路飙升。【原文：Oracle Corp. is on track to add about $190 billion to its market value after a blowout revenue forecast for its cloud infrastructure business sent the stock soaring.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所双子星将美国 IPO 目标提高至 4.333 亿美元
item.description: 双子座空间站公司将其首次公开募股的潜在规模提高到 4.333 亿美元，此前该公司的超额认购吸引了另一家交易所运营商的私募。【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc. increased the potential size of its initial public offering to $433.3 million, after the oversubscribed listing drew a private placement from another exchange operator.】

item.title: 贸易战影响中国销售，Synopsys 大跌
item.description: 芯片设计软件制造商 Synopsys 公司警告说，美国的出口限制导致中国这个最大的半导体市场增长放缓，该公司股票在盘后交易中暴跌。【原文：Shares of chip-design software maker Synopsys Inc. plummeted in extended trading after warning that US export restrictions are contributing to a slowdown in China, the largest market for semiconductors.】

item.title: 凯尔重启谈判，英国寻求扩大在华商业准入
item.description: 英国商务大臣彼得-凯尔（Peter Kyle）将推动中国为英国企业提供更大的市场准入，他将出席两国自 2018 年以来的首次高级别贸易讨论。【原文：UK Business Secretary Peter Kyle is set to push China for greater market access to British businesses, as he attends the first high-level trade discussions between the two countries since 2018.】

item.title: 基金顾问公司 Vukota 与美国证券交易委员会就误导投资者达成和解
item.description: 一名前科罗拉多州居民和他控制的两家投资顾问公司同意向美国证券交易委员会支付 100 万美元的罚款，以了结他和这两家公司误导投资者并获取数百万不义之财的指控。【原文：A former Colorado resident and two investment adviser firms he controls agreed to pay the Securities and Exchange Commission a $1 million penalty to settle claims he and the firms misled investors and reaped millions in ill-gotten gains.】

item.title: 第五季保险公司因借款人涉嫌欺诈被罚 2 亿美元
item.description: Fifth Third Bancorp 表示，该公司发现其一家商业借款人涉嫌欺诈活动。【原文：Fifth Third Bancorp said it discovered allegedly fraudulent activity at one of its commercial borrowers.】

item.title: 特朗普提出对中国和印度征收新关税以压制俄罗斯
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统告诉欧洲官员，他愿意对印度和中国征收全面的新关税，以推动弗拉基米尔-普京总统与乌克兰谈判，但前提是欧盟国家也这样做。【原文：President Donald Trump told European officials he’s willing to impose sweeping new tariffs on India and China to push President Vladimir Putin to the negotiating table with Ukraine — but only if EU nations do so as well.】

item.title: 泰克股东称英格洛交易可能需要更高的价格
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）的一位股东称，该公司的价值高于英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）同意支付的金额，可能需要更多甜头才能达成有史以来最大的矿业交易之一。【原文：A Teck Resources Ltd. shareholder says the company is worth more than what Anglo American Plc has agreed to pay, and a sweetener might be needed to cinch one of the biggest mining deals ever.】

item.title: 通胀放缓，智利央行维持 4.75% 的利率不变
item.description: 智利央行在上一次会议上下调了主要利率，此后一直维持利率不变，因为决策者们警告说，在一个四年多未达到目标的国家，存在持续通胀的风险。【原文：Chile’s central bank held its key interest rate unchanged following a cut at the prior meeting as policymakers warned of the risk of sustained inflation in a country that hasn’t hit the target in more than four years.】

item.title: 据说嘉吉支持债权人追逐大型大豆工厂的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc.【原文：Cargill Inc. is in advanced talks to back a hostile creditor’s bid to take over a distressed Argentine soy exporter, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 最高法院将对特朗普关税进行快速审查
item.description: 美国最高法院表示，它将决定唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分关税是否合法，同意在这起具有全球金融和政治影响的案件中迅速审查对其标志性经济政策的挑战。【原文：The US Supreme Court said it will decide whether the bulk of President Donald Trump’s tariffs are legal, agreeing to quickly review a challenge to his signature economic policy in a case with worldwide financial and political implications.】

item.title: 国债投资者在 CPI 数据公布前增加看涨头寸
item.description: 在本周的通胀报告公布之前，投资者倾向于看涨美国国债，因为近期一系列低于预期的数据为美联储在 9 月份降息以及在未来几个月进一步放宽货币政策打开了大门。【原文：Investors are leaning into bullish bets on US Treasuries ahead of this week’s inflation report, as a recent run of softer-than-expected data opens the door for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates in September and further ease monetary policy in the months ahead.】

item.title: 大型太阳能开发商发现美国项目审批出现延误
item.description: 大型太阳能发电场的开发商表示，特朗普政府已经停止了对影响联邦土地的项目的审批，这可能导致代价高昂的延误。【原文：Developers of large solar farms said the Trump administration has stopped moving forward on approvals for projects that impact federal land, potentially leading to costly delays.】

item.title: Invesco 的 de Longis 在美联储会议前 "最大限度 "减持美元
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 的 Alessio de Longis 认为，由于美联储似乎即将放宽货币政策，美元将面临更多的痛苦，这将缩小美元相对于其他货币的收益率优势。【原文：Invesco Ltd.’s Alessio de Longis sees more pain ahead for the dollar as the Federal Reserve appears close to easing monetary policy, which would shrink its yield advantage over its peers.】

item.title: 甲骨文达成OpenAI云交易后账面业绩强劲
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）在与 OpenAI 达成巨额交易后，最近一个季度的预订量大幅飙升。该公司股价在延时交易中大涨。【原文：Oracle Corp. posted a huge jump in bookings in the latest quarter, following a massive deal with OpenAI. The shares surged in extended trading.】

item.title: 墨西哥关税上调将遵循世贸组织规则，产生 38 亿美元收入
item.description: 墨西哥财政部长告诉记者，墨西哥将对来自贸易协定未涵盖国家的商品提高关税，同时确保进口关税符合世界贸易组织的规则。【原文：Mexico will increase tariffs on goods from countries not covered by a trade deal while ensuring the import duties will be in line with World Trade Organization rules, Mexico’s finance chief told reporters.】

item.title: 谷歌云预测到 2027 年收入将增长 580 亿美元
item.description: Alphabet 公司的谷歌云计算部门首席执行官托马斯-库里安（Thomas Kurian）表示，该部门尚未履行的现有客户合同承诺金额高达 1060 亿美元。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google cloud computing division has up to $106 billion in commitments from existing customer contracts that it has yet to fulfill, according to the division’s Chief Executive Officer, Thomas Kurian.】

item.title: Flagstar 首席执行官奥廷称纽约市银行必须面对马姆达尼的现实
item.description: Flagstar Financial Inc.首席执行官约瑟夫-奥廷（Joseph Otting）正在为佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）的纽约之行做准备。【原文：Flagstar Financial Inc. Chief Executive Officer Joseph Otting is preparing for Zohran Mamdani’s New York City.】

item.title: 圣莫尼卡在虐待赔偿案中考虑财政困难投票
item.description: 加利福尼亚州圣莫尼卡市的官员周二将就是否通过一项宣布财政困难的决议进行投票，因为越来越多的性虐待赔偿已经破坏了该市的财政稳定，这与其他地方政府已经陷入更深债务困境的情况如出一辙。【原文：Santa Monica, California officials are voting Tuesday on whether to adopt a resolution declaring fiscal distress, as mounting sexual abuse settlements have destabilized the city’s finances, echoing strains that have already pushed other local governments deeper into debt.】

item.title: 嘉能可称盎格鲁已将自己置于泰克报价的竞争中
item.description: 据一位分析师称，英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）和泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）周二宣布了有史以来最大的企业矿业合并案之一，英美资源集团在竞争对手的收购要约面前同样不堪一击。【原文：Anglo American Plc is just as vulnerable to a rival takeover offer as Teck Resources Ltd., after the two announced one of the biggest-ever corporate mining combinations on Tuesday, according to an analyst.】

item.title: 贾维斯称摩根大通在宽大处理申请中损失 2 亿美元
item.description: 查理-贾维斯（Charlie Javice）今年 3 月被判犯有欺诈摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Charlie Javice, who was convicted in March of defrauding JPMorgan Chase & Co. into acquiring her student-finance startup, argued for a lenient sentence, saying an estimated $200 million loss was “not consequential” for the largest US bank.】

item.title: 报道称医疗保险奖金现在更难获得，Humana 下挫
item.description: 周二，Humana 公司股价下跌，因为有报道称，医疗保险健康计划获得奖金的标准似乎变得更具挑战性。【原文：Humana Inc. shares dropped Tuesday after reports suggested that criteria for Medicare health plans to earn bonus payments appeared to get more challenging.】

item.title: Meta 将斥资 1.4 亿美元使用黑森林实验室的人工智能图像技术
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司签署了一份价值超过 1 亿美元的多年期合同，使用人工智能图像初创公司 Black Forest Labs 的技术，这是该社交媒体公司为扩大其人工智能产品而进行的最新投资。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has signed a multi-year contract worth more than $100 million to use technology from AI image startup Black Forest Labs, the latest investment by the social media firm to expand its artificial intelligence offerings.】

item.title: 摩根大通为夏威夷电力寻求垃圾债券交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is holding meetings with investors over a possible high-yield bond sale for Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 施瓦布公司的阿吉拉尔说，大幅降息有可能吓到投资者
item.description: 查尔斯-施瓦布公司（Charles Schwab Corp）的奥马尔-阿吉拉尔（Omar Aguilar）认为，美联储下周降息四分之一点将是对金融资产最有利的情况，而更大幅度的降息则有可能引起投资者恐慌。【原文：A quarter-point interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve next week would be the most favorable scenario for financial assets, with a deeper reduction running the risk of alarming investors, according to Charles Schwab Corp.’s Omar Aguilar.】

item.title: 美国 Altice 更换顾问重启债务重组谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Altice USA Inc. 已更换顾问，希望重启与债权人的谈判，以减少其 260 亿美元的债务。【原文：Altice USA Inc. has switched advisers as it looks to revive talks with creditors to reduce its $26 billion debt pile, according to people familiar with the matter.】
